Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a blackjack hand for a player

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FACE_VALUE
      Value of a face card in blackjack
      static int MAX_ACE_VALUE
      Maximum value of an ace.
      static int MAX_NUM_CARDS
      Maximum number of cards in hand, since will bust with that many cards
      static int MAX_VALID_SCORE
      Maximum valid score; will bust for any higher score
      static int MIN_ACE_VALUE
      Minimum value of an ace.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand(DeckOfCards thedeck)
      Creates the hand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dealInitialHand()
      Deals initial two cards for this hand
      int getNumCards()
      Returns the number of cards in the hand
      int getScore()
      Returns the current score
      boolean hasBlackJack()
      Returns whether or not the hand has blackjack
      boolean hasBusted()
      Returns whether or not the hand has "busted"
      void hit()
      Adds one card to this hand and updates the score
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the hand

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_NUM_CARDS

        public static final int MAX_NUM_CARDS
        Maximum number of cards in hand, since will bust with that many cards
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_VALID_SCORE

        public static final int MAX_VALID_SCORE
        Maximum valid score; will bust for any higher score
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_ACE_VALUE

        public static final int MAX_ACE_VALUE
        Maximum value of an ace. Only one ace per hand can have this value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_ACE_VALUE

        public static final int MIN_ACE_VALUE
        Minimum value of an ace. Used when maximum value would cause hand to bust.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FACE_VALUE

        public static final int FACE_VALUE
        Value of a face card in blackjack
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
